scripts.build-client: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd client && npm run build && cd -  && mkdir -p dist/client && cp -a client/build/. dist/client/build/"
scripts.start-prod: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run clean && npm run build-server && npm run build-client && ts-node -r ./dist/server/index.js "
scripts.lint: cd server && eslint **/*.ts --ignore-pattern extlib.d.ts && cd client && eslint client/**/*.tsx?
